Data Sciences in ENS

A morning of conference

The CFM-ENS chair “Modèles et Sciences des Données” organize a morning of conferences on Data Sciences on December 10th, from 9:00 to 13:00 (with lunch buffet at 13:00) in the Physics Department of ENS, 24 rue Lhomond, in room CONF IV (2nd floor).

When

Monday, December 10th 2018, 09:00-13:00.

Where

Physics Department of ENS, 24 rue Lhomond, in room CONF IV (2nd floor).

Schedule

  • 09h00: Welcome reception
  • 09h20:10:00: Lenka Zdeborova (CNRS & CEA Saclay), Computational and information-theoretic phase transitions in learning problems
  • 10:00-10:40: Florent Benaych-Georges (CFM), RIE for cross-covariance matrices
  • 10:40-11:00: Coffee break
  • 11:00-11:40: Marco Cuturi (ENSAE and Google Brain), Optimal Transport for Machine Learning.
  • 11:40-12:20: Alexios beveratos (CFM), Data insights for stocks
  • 12:20-13:00: Giulio Biroli (ENS Paris), Deep Neural Networks: a Perspective based on the Physics of Glassy Systems
  • 13:00: Lunch in the Hall of the Physics department
